ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Epic quest
ygData.msgSnippet: no lute has dropped the last 2 clearings.  is it only a SW drop?  but like you said, no real need with SSS though it s nice all the same.  we did get a grey
ygData.messageBody:
no lute has dropped the last 2 clearings. is it only a SW drop? but like
you said, no real need with SSS though it's nice all the same. we did get a
grey suede shoes and that 40/35 monk staff. we got a crown and 2 shrouds
off PD, no robe yet though.

Shada

> Have you
> gotten one of those nifty Lyran's Lutes yet? I love that
> thing, not sure how
> often I'll use it though once I get my SSS. Also RE: Phara
> Dar - Grey Suede
> Boots and Robe of Azure Sky finally dropped (last week), I'm
> sure you've
> either seen them drop or saw the pics on FoH's website. The
> robe itself
> makes me drool and I HATE playing caster classes.
>
> Sartori{Legion}
> 57th Troubador, Veeshan
